response.overview: Learning English is great fun! Thanks to funny stories, cheerful songs and rhythms, children "absorb" English completely naturally, without having to learn it specifically. Learning in the form of situations and whole phrases so that children can use new words effectively and quickly. Mária Podhradská's proven method really works - from the youngest 2-year-olds to schoolchildren! Look forward to new adventures - we will take you on an adventurous trip to see forest animals, make a delicious fruit cake with hedgehogs, sew a new dress with Tailor Rak and go to the fireflies for a bright light. We will play at the store, learn magic words and finally help the little mice make up...
response.title: Angličanina 3
